column2: This is a Red Fighter, common on the battlefields of Mars. They give the user a tactical edge and greater defense but are often made of shoddy material.

The AP-6 STRIKER is the most advanced Mech Suit designed by Spacer engineers.Equipped with guns and cannons unfamiliar to the people of Mars, it has devastating effect on the battlefield. However, it can be as dangerous to the pilot as to his foe...
This is a Zhao Ranger Mech Suit designed Spacer engineers.It is equipped with an autocannon and automatic defensive capabilities.
This person is authorized to purchase mech suits.
This character is authorized to pilot a personalized Mech Suit
Purchase your own Combat Mech Suit
Look for a Spacer Trader to buy a Mech Suit on the black market
Consult your Marshall about purchasing a high end Mech Suit
You have purchased a piloting license and are now authorized to pilot a Combat Mech Suit. Be careful!
You enter the hangar, inspecting all the potential mech suits. "That one," you say, pointing to a beautiful mechanized work of art.

You meet your contact, a Cetinese trader with a mechanic eye, at a hangar not too far from your capital. "They're masterworks, all. You can't go wrong," he says as he unveils his 'toys' for you to see.

You've finally accumulated enough money to purchase the AP-6 STRIKER, the most powerful Mech Suit available on Mars. You can barely keep the grin off of your face as the Armor Merchant hands you the keys to the cockpit.
